Package services

Class AppointmentService

java.lang.Object
services.AppointmentService
All Implemented Interfaces:
IAppointmentService
public class AppointmentService extends Object implements IAppointmentService
Service class for managing appointments in a hospital management system. This class provides functionality to schedule, cancel, reschedule, and view appointments, as well as to record outcomes and manage medication statuses.

      Specified by:

      Parameters:
      appointmentId - The ID of the appointment to record the outcome for.
      serviceProvided - The services provided during the appointment.
      prescribedMedications - The list of medications prescribed during the appointment.
      consultationNotes - Additional notes from the consultation.
      prescribedQuantities - A list of quantities corresponding to the prescribed medications.

    • loadAppointmentsFromCSV

      public void loadAppointmentsFromCSV()
      Loads all appointments from a CSV file into the appointments list.

      This method clears any existing appointments in memory and then reads each line from the CSV file, skipping the header line. Each line is converted into an `Appointment` object and added to the appointments list. If there is an issue reading the file, an error message is logged to the console.

    • saveAppointmentsToCSV

      public void saveAppointmentsToCSV()
      Saves all appointments from the appointments list to a CSV file.

      This method overwrites the CSV file with the current list of appointments in memory. It writes a header row followed by each appointment in the list, converted to its string representation. If there is an issue writing to the file, an error message is logged to the console.

    • findAppointment

      public Appointment findAppointment(String patientId, String doctorId, LocalDate date, LocalTime timeSlot)
      Finds an appointment based on the patient ID, doctor ID, appointment date, and time slot.
      Parameters:
      patientId - the ID of the patient
      doctorId - the ID of the doctor
      date - the date of the appointment
      timeSlot - the time slot of the appointment
      Returns:
      the `Appointment` object if a match is found, or `null` if no matching appointment exists

    • updateAppointment

      public void updateAppointment(Appointment updatedAppointment)
      Updates an existing appointment in the appointments list.

      This method searches for the appointment by its ID and replaces it with the updated version. If the appointment is found and updated, the changes are saved to the CSV file. If the appointment is not found, a message is printed to the console.

      Parameters:
      updatedAppointment - the updated `Appointment` object to replace the existing one
